title: Benzingia
text:
Benzingia is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="flowering%20plant">flowering plant</a>s from the orchid family, <a href="Orchidaceae">Orchidaceae</a>. It is native to mountains of <a href="Central%20America">Central America</a> and northwestern <a href="South%20America">South America</a> from <a href="Costa%20Rica">Costa Rica</a> to <a href="Peru">Peru</a>.
Species.
 nine species are recognized:
